</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

This file defines passes to print out IR in various granularities.

The PrintModulePass pass simply prints out the entire module when it is executed. The PrintFunctionPass class is designed to be pipelined with other FunctionPass&#39;s, and prints out the functions of the module as they are processed.
